translations: 有抵抗力的；抗……的，耐……的；电阻的

sentences.sentence: It's always opposing the velocity, so this is the magnitude of the resistive force.
sentences.translation: 总是和速度相反，这是阻力的大小。

sentences.sentence: A resistive screen also gradually wears out and requires more frequent calibration.
sentences.translation: 电阻屏需要保护膜以及相对更频繁的校准。

sentences.sentence: Definitely more expensive than resistive screens, by between 10% and 50%, depending on who you talk to.
sentences.translation: 不同厂商的电容屏价格比电阻屏贵10%到50%。
